title: Cashier/Server
label: post
post:
Job Posting: Cashier/server for takeout

Location: Brooklyn, NY | Restaurant Type: Caribbean Cuisine



We are seeking a dedicated, experienced, and agile Cashier/Server to join our vibrant takeout Caribbean restaurant in Brooklyn.



Key Responsibilities:

• Serve guests professionally, ensuring excellent customer experience

• Assist in food prep

• Maintain cleanliness and organization of the kitchen and dining area

• Perform inventory checks and restock as needed

• Lift and carry items up to 40 pounds

• Follow all health and safety standards



Requirements:

• Prior experience as both a server is a plus.

• Knowledge of or passion for Caribbean cuisine

• Must be clean, agile, and detail-oriented

• Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment

• Must be able to work flexible shifts including weekends and evenings

• A NYC food handlers certificate



Perks:

• Competitive hourly wage

• Opportunities for growth within the restaurant

• Staff meals and supportive team environment



To apply, please send your resume or text 917.482.6552



Join us and bring Caribbean flavor to NYC
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

title: cashier and pizza man
label: post
post:
*The Oven's Slice - Job Opportunities*



*Location:* 84 Rivington St, Manhattan, NY



*We're Hiring:*



- *Night Shift Cashier*

- Excellent customer service skills

- Ability to problem-solve and work independently

- Availability for night shift schedule

- Reliable and punctual

- Pay: $16-$18 per hour + tips

- 35-40 hours per week

- Payment by check



- *Experienced Pizza Maker*

- Previous experience in pizza preparation

- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

- Team player

- Pay: $20-$22 per hour + tips



*About Us:*

The Oven's Slice is a place that values exceptional customer service and a positive work environment. We're committed to providing
our employees with the tools and support they need to succeed.



*How to Apply:*

Apply in person:

Friday to Sunday, 5:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m.

84 Rivington St, Manhattan, NY



*We look forward to meeting you!*

title: Caribbean Restaurant Hiring
label: post
post:
Do you consider yourself a Caribbean food lover, proactive at what you do and capable of rendering service like no other? Our
Caribbean Restaurant is in search of lively and well-experienced people who are ready to be part of our exciting team!



Locations:

Brooklyn

Queens

Manhattan

Bronx



When applying kindly indicate your desired location to help us process your application efficiently.

Submit your resumes today, we look forward to hearing from you!



Available Positions:



Assistant Manager

Job Summary

The Assistant Manager will support the General Manager in overseeing daily operations, ensuring exceptional customer service, and
maintaining the highest standards of quality in food and beverage service. This role is integral to the smooth functioning of the
restaurant and involves managing staff, resolving customer issues, and contributing to the overall success of the business.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Supervise and coordinate restaurant staff to ensure efficient daily operations.

• Train, motivate, and evaluate team members to maintain high performance.

• Assist in managing inventory and placing orders for supplies and ingredients.

• Address customer concerns promptly and professionally.

• Ensure compliance with health, safety, and hygiene regulations.

• Oversee scheduling to ensure adequate staff coverage during all shifts.

• Support marketing initiatives and help drive sales growth.

• Handle cash management and reconcile end-of-day sales reports.

Qualifications and Skills

• MUST HAVE a valid NYC Food Handler's Certification.

• Minimum 5 years of managerial experience in the restaurant industry.

• Strong leadership and problem-solving skills.

• Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.

• Knowledge of Caribbean cuisine is a plus.





Shift Supervisor

Job Summary

The Shift Supervisor is responsible for leading the team during their shift, ensuring smooth operations, and delivering
exceptional customer service. This role involves managing daily tasks, supporting staff, and ensuring compliance with restaurant
policies and standards.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Oversee team members during assigned shifts.

• Ensure food quality and customer service standards are met.

• Address customer inquiries and resolve issues.

• Train and mentor new staff members.

• Monitor inventory levels and assist with restocking as needed.

• Enforce compliance with safety and sanitation regulations.

• Assist with opening and closing procedures.

Qualifications and Skills

• MUST HAVE a valid NYC Food Handler's Certification.

• Proven supervisory experience in the restaurant industry.

• Strong organizational and time-management skills.

• Ability to motivate and lead a team effectively.





Cashier/Server

Job Summary

The Cashier/Server plays a dual role in providing excellent customer service, whether at the counter or in the dining area. This
role includes efficiently processing orders and payments, guiding customers through the menu, and ensuring a welcoming and
satisfying dining experience.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Greet customers warmly and take orders accurately, including online and in-person orders.

• Process payments efficiently and handle cash or card transactions.

• Serve food and beverages promptly and courteously, ensuring accuracy.

• Answer customer inquiries about menu items, promotions, and order status.

• Assist with packaging orders and maintaining order accuracy.

• Set up tables, clean, and reset the dining area as needed.

• Collaborate with kitchen staff to ensure smooth and timely service.

• Maintain cleanliness and organization at the cashier station and dining area.

• Address customer needs and resolve any concerns to ensure satisfaction.

Qualifications and Skills

• Ability to read and understand online orders.

• Minimum 1 year of experience in a restaurant setting.

• Strong multitasking and customer service skills.

• Excellent communication skills with a friendly and professional demeanor.

• Basic math skills for processing payments.

• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to different roles.





Cleaner

Job Summary

The Cleaner is responsible for maintaining a clean and sanitary environment in all areas of the restaurant.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Clean and sanitize dining areas, kitchen, restrooms, and equipment.

• Dispose of trash and recycling appropriately.

• Restock cleaning supplies and inform management of low inventory.

• Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations.

• Assist with additional cleaning tasks as needed.

Qualifications and Skills

• Attention to detail and ability to follow cleaning procedures.

• Previous experience in a cleaning or janitorial role is a plus.

• Reliable and punctual.





Cook

Job Summary

The Cook prepares high-quality dishes that showcase Caribbean flavors, ensuring consistency, taste, and presentation align with
restaurant standards.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Prepare and cook menu items according to recipes and guidelines.

• Maintain a clean and organized workspace.

• Monitor inventory and communicate needs to management.

• Ensure food is prepared safely and meets quality standards.

• Collaborate with kitchen staff to meet customer demands.

• Assist with menu development and new dish ideas.

Qualifications and Skills

• Proven cooking experience in a restaurant setting.

• Knowledge of Caribbean cuisine is highly preferred.

• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

• Strong attention to detail and time management skills.





Social Media Intern

Job Summary

The Social Media Intern will assist in managing the restaurant’s online presence by creating engaging content, promoting the
brand, and interacting with the online community.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Develop and schedule posts for social media platforms.

• Respond to customer inquiries and comments online.

• Assist in planning and executing promotional campaigns.

• Monitor analytics to measure engagement and reach.

• Take photos and videos of menu items and events.

Qualifications and Skills

• Knowledge of social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok).

• Strong writing and content creation skills.

• Interest in Caribbean cuisine and culture is a plus.





Bartender

Job Summary

The Bartender is responsible for crafting beverages, providing excellent customer service, and maintaining a clean and organized
bar.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Mix and serve alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

• Ensure compliance with legal drinking age regulations.

• Maintain stock levels and inform management of inventory needs.

• Clean and sanitize bar equipment and workstations.

• Engage with customers and recommend menu items.

Qualifications and Skills

• Proven bartending experience in a fast-paced environment.

• Knowledge of Caribbean-inspired cocktails is a plus.

• Excellent customer service and multitasking abilities.





Kitchen Manager

Job Summary

We are seeking a motivated and experienced Kitchen Manager to lead and oversee our kitchen operations. The ideal candidate will be
responsible for ensuring the smooth running of the kitchen, maintaining high standards of food quality, and managing kitchen staff
effectively.



Responsibilities and Duties

• Supervise and coordinate all kitchen activities to ensure efficient operations.

• Manage food preparation and presentation to maintain consistent quality and standards.

• Oversee inventory, order supplies, and minimize waste to optimize profitability.

• Train, schedule, and evaluate kitchen staff to ensure high performance and adherence to safety regulations.

• Maintain cleanliness and compliance with health and safety standards.

• Collaborate with management to develop menus, specials, and pricing strategies.

• Monitor kitchen equipment and arrange maintenance or replacements as necessary.

• Resolve any issues or conflicts within the kitchen team promptly and professionally.



Qualifications and Skills

• MUST HAVE a valid NYC Food Handler's Certification.

• MUST HAVE 2-5 years of proven experience as a Kitchen Manager or similar leadership role in a culinary setting.

• Strong knowledge of food preparation, safety, and sanitation standards.

• Excellent leadership and team management skills.

• Effective communication and problem-solving abilities.

• Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.

• Flexibility to work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required.





Handyman

Job Summary

The Handyman will be responsible for performing a variety of maintenance and repair tasks to ensure the upkeep and functionality
of facilities. This role involves addressing general maintenance issues across multiple trades, including plumbing, carpentry, and
electrical work.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Perform repairs and maintenance tasks, such as fixing plumbing leaks, electrical issues, and damaged structures.

• Conduct routine inspections to identify and resolve potential problems.

• Assemble and install furniture, fixtures, and equipment.

• Patch walls, paint surfaces, and handle minor construction work.

• Respond to work orders and prioritize tasks effectively.

• Maintain tools and equipment in good working condition.

• Ensure compliance with safety regulations during all tasks.

Qualifications and Skills

• Knowledge of basic plumbing, electrical, and carpentry work.

• Proficiency in using hand tools and power tools.

• Strong problem-solving and time management skills.

• Knows how to fix restaurant equipment’s.

• Physical ability to lift heavy objects and perform manual labor.

• Previous experience in a similar role is preferred.

• A valid driver’s license is a plus.





Baker

Job Summary

The Baker will prepare and bake a variety of breads, pastries, and desserts while maintaining high-quality standards. This role
includes following recipes, decorating baked goods, and ensuring a clean and safe workspace.

Responsibilities and Duties

• Bake bread, pastries, and desserts according to established recipes.

• Measure and mix ingredients with precision to achieve consistent results.

• Decorate cakes and pastries to meet quality and aesthetic standards.

• Operate baking equipment, including ovens and mixers.

• Monitor inventory levels and place orders for supplies when needed.

• Ensure the kitchen and baking area are clean and organized.

• Follow food safety and sanitation guidelines.

• Experiment with new recipes and contribute creative ideas to the menu.

Qualifications and Skills

• Experience in baking or a related field.

• Familiarity with baking techniques, tools, and equipment.

• Attention to detail and creativity in decorating baked goods.

• Strong organizational and time management skills.

• Physical ability to stand for extended periods and lift heavy ingredients.

• Formal training in baking or pastry arts is a plus.
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

title: Now Hiring Experienced Cashiers - Must have full availability
label: post
post:
Wu and Nussbaum is looking for experienced cashiers to join our team on the UWS! We are a Bagel and Coffee shop concept combined
with a Chinese Café. We are looking for driven, hard working individuals ready to work in a fast paced environment.



You are: An individual experienced in customer service, looking to join a respectful and well established team. Someone who works
well under the pressure of a high volume environment and realizes the importance of teamwork. Organized and efficient, you are
task focused with excellent time management skills. 



We are: A café that prides ourselves in building a healthy, strong work environment for our employees. We are a fast paced casual
dining experience. Our main focus is to provide our guests with exceptional food and beverage, while maintaining a happy, lively
atmosphere.



• Must be able to work weekends

• English and Spanish a plus

• Must have a social security card



If you are interested in joining our team at 2897 Broadway, pease TEXT Benjamin at (646) 804-9736



We look forward to hearing from you!
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

title: Dominique Ansel Bakery now hiring a FRONT OF HOUSE TEAM MEMBER
label: post
post:
Become a part of the team for world-renowned James Beard Winning Pastry Chef Dominique Ansel’s flagship: Dominique Ansel Bakery.





We are looking for dedicated, passionate, hard-working individuals to be part of the team for our bakery located in SOHO. We are
excited to share our pastries with the neighborhood and our team. Come grow with us!



We believe in teaching our team to develop a lifelong passion for food and the culinary world. Our managers see themselves as
teachers who work alongside our team members in a fast-paced environment to maintain a hospitality-oriented outlook. We aim to
provide the best experience possible for all of our guests. A positive attitude and a love of service is your best asset.



Members of our team are expected to have POS and basic coffee knowledge, as well as be comfortable with menu memorization and
regular communication with the team on inventory, customer service, and special promotions.



If you are a customer service professional, an experienced server or bartender, a retail superstar, an award-winning barista, or
even just a creative individual with a positive mindset - this could be the job for you.



All applicants should have:



• A genuine passion and knowledge for food and pastry

• Experience greeting customers and properly taking food orders

• Good memorization skills - the ability to learn menu details and provide the information about our products eloquently to our
guests is absolutely essential

• The ability to prepare all drink orders and food packaging to high standards

• Experience operating a cash register, accurately making counts and providing change to customers

• The ability to follow the bakery operational policies including safety and security procedures

• A habit of working cleanly and experience with break down and set up and general cleaning of stations

• The ability to maintain calm demeanor during periods of high volume, providing a positive example for the team

• Reliability and punctuality



Full-timers receive ACA compliant health care, eligibility to participate in a 401K Plan, NYS Sick Pay Leave, Commuter Benefits.



Please visit our website to learn more about our company: www.dominiqueansel.com

Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

do NOT contact us with unsolicited services or offers

label: post
post:
Mokbar is a series of restaurants owned by Chef Esther Choi, who wants to introduce Korean culture to a wider audience through the
comforts of food.



Mokbar (located in Chelsea Market) is currently looking for part-time/full-time cashiers/servers.



We are looking to re-open dine-in seating, which means we will be needing servers! We are also looking for cashiers in the front
to handle to the to-go packaging and deliveries..



Experience and familiarity with Korean food is a plus, but it is not necessary.

title: Pizza Cook / Pizza Counter 20$/hr + tips
label: post
post:
Unregular Pizza is looking for an enthusiastic Cashier/Pizza Cook to join our Unregular Team!



The Cashier/Pizza Cook responsibilities are to:



- Prepare Roman style pizza (will be trained first, however some experience is required!!)



- Do some light food prep



- Manage the pizza counter making sure all products are fresh and look great



- Serve guests by reheating and packaging food



- Cash Handling responsibilities/basic knowledge of POS software



- Educate guests on our Unregular products



- Provide a memorable experience to guests by explaining our unique products



- Keep station clean and in order at all times



- Communicate and work well with other coworkers



- English is a Must, Spanish is a PLUS!!



- Basic knowledge of 3rd party delivery platforms such as Grubhub, Uber Eats, DoorDash, etc.



- Be able to manage a shift by yourself.



- Be on time, responsible, well-groomed, neat and clean.



- Pay is in check or direct deposit only, NO CASH



- Morning and Evening Shifts available



Please send Resume attached to email in PDF form and include "Cashier/Pizza Cook" in the subject line of your email. We look
forward to hearing from you and have an Unregular Day!!!
notices: OK for recruiters to contact this job poster.

title: ***Hiring Event-NYBG-October 20th and October 27th***
label: post
post:
Constellation Culinary Group is hiring at the New York Botanical Garden in the Bronx, NY!



Our team is seeking friendly, knowledgeable individuals who want to be part of a team who serves indoors/outdoors and throughout
the year.



Team members enjoy competitive wages, weekly pay, and flexible schedules.





Open Interviews will be held on Monday October 20th and Monday October 27th for part-time position listed below from 10am-1pm:



•Host-$19 an hour.

•Cashier-$18 an hour.

•Line Cook-$20-$25 an hour.

•Server-$17 an hour plus tips.

•Runner-$16 an hour plus tips.

•Busser-$16 an hour plus tips.

•Dishwasher-$17-$18 an hour.

•Barista-$18-$22 an hour.









Please RSVP to event via Link Below:



Please copy and paste the entire link below into your URL to select a time and date to interview.





https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScyZo2kLGcTRxYyb9dBoA_sKRPyIHVi3JrxQltL1C8oE_7e-Q/viewform?usp=header
[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScyZo2kLGcTRxYyb9dBoA_sKRPyIHVi3JrxQltL1C8oE_7e-Q/viewform?usp=header]





***PLEASE MAKE SURE THAT YOU RSVP TO THE EVENT AND HAVE YOUR ID ON THE DAY OF THE EVENT, YOU WILL NOT BE SEEN IF YOUR NAME IS NOT
ON OUR LIST AND YOU DO NOT HAVE AN ID***







***Please Bring a copy of your resume with you***







Location: 2950 Southern Blvd, Bronx New York 10458







Qualifications:



Available on Saturday/Sunday a must

Willing to work holidays

Ability to climb stairs and stand for long periods of time

Willing to work outdoors in the Summer and Winter as needed



About Constellation:



From retail spaces to office buildings, Constellation provides high-quality business dining and catering experiences all over the
United States. Constellation takes pride in building every meal around its goal of fostering connections through food and
hospitality.



About Elior North America:



Elior North America is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without
regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran
status. We are committed to diversity and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and abilities. We take pride in
supporting the development of our employees and their skills at all levels and in fostering an environment of growth.



At Elior North America, we are committed to offering growth and advancement opportunities for all of our employees. The valuable
skills and experience you’ve gained with Elior will propel you further in your career, whether with our corporate office or one of
our brand segments.
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

title: Hiring Servers
label: post
post:
We are looking for competent Restaurant Servers to take and serve orders. You’ll be the face of our restaurant and responsible for
our guests' experiences. Responsibilities include ensuring the restaurant is clean and tidy when guests arrive, as well as being
knowledgeable about our bar program and food. You need to be quick on your feet (literally and metaphorically) and have a polite
and friendly attitude. If you enjoy talking to people and thrive in a fast-paced workplace, we’d like to meet you. Your ultimate
goal will be to provide high-quality service that will help us maintain and attract customers.



We are currently hiring for both of our locations, Midtown (3 West 36th St) or West Village (43 Carmine St.)



Responsibilities:



-Maintain bar and floor setup with special attention to sanitation and order

-Attend to customers upon entrance

-Present restaurant menus and help customers select food/beverages

-Take and serve orders

-Answer questions or make recommendations for complementary products

-Collaborate with other restaurant servers and kitchen/bar staff

-Deal with complaints or problems with a positive attitude

-Issue bills and accept payment



Skills:



-Knowledge of drinks

-Proven server or bartender experience

-Hands-on experience in cashier duties

-Attention to cleanliness and safety

-Patience and customer-oriented approach

-Excellent people skills with a friendly attitude

-Responsible and trustworthy



Please provide at least one reference to a previous restaurant employer. Please note that availability during the weekends is a
must due to the nature of the business.



Only applications with resumes attached will be considered. We recommend them to be in a PDF to ensure we're able to open them.



Pay: Up to $40 per hour (with tips)



Benefits: Employee discount



Supplemental Pay: Tips

Hours per week: 30 - 40
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

[https://handy.com/apply/?iama=handyman&job_posting_id=11e738aa-3194-4b99-81be-f5be33c06973&lcl_post_time=20251012_121400&utm_campaign=%5B%22NNJ-Handy-Supply-Branded-Handyman-DR%22%5D&utm_content=title-379%3Bimage-449%3Bdesc-379%3Btag-1378&utm_medium=Details&utm_source=craigslist]

Looking for handymen with experience! Angi Services for Pros is a nationwide home services platform that is looking to connect
professional handymen with customers. Angi Services operates in more than 250 cities and has been featured in sites like Forbes,
NYTimes, CNBC, The Economist.


Our app will connect you to customers instantly. Switch it on to see people near you who booked a handyman service. Claim the job
to connect with the customer. Arrive on time. Complete their service call. Get paid!


The details:


- Make money performing light handyman jobs: heavy lifting, furniture assembly, tv mounting, - Complete transparency: see how much
you earn from the customer for each job before you claim it


Who are you?


- Are able to perform a variety of home improvement tasks independently


- Have all your own hand tools and power tools


- 18+ with paid experience in home improvement


Angi Services is not an employer, but simply connects independent service professionals with customers looking for home services.

title: Pizza Cook / Pizza Counter 20$/hr + tips
label: post
post:
Unregular Pizza is looking for an enthusiastic Cashier/Pizza Cook to join our Unregular Team!



The Cashier/Pizza Cook responsibilities are to:



- Prepare Roman style pizza (will be trained first, however some experience is required!!)



- Do some light food prep



- Manage the pizza counter making sure all products are fresh and look great



- Serve guests by reheating and packaging food



- Cash Handling responsibilities/basic knowledge of POS software



- Educate guests on our Unregular products



- Provide a memorable experience to guests by explaining our unique products



- Keep station clean and in order at all times



- Communicate and work well with other coworkers



- English is a Must, Spanish is a PLUS!!



- Basic knowledge of 3rd party delivery platforms such as Grubhub, Uber Eats, DoorDash, etc.



- Be able to manage a shift by yourself.



- Be on time, responsible, well-groomed, neat and clean.



- Pay is in check or direct deposit only, NO CASH



- Morning and Evening Shifts available



Please send Resume attached to email in PDF form and include "Cashier/Pizza Cook" in the subject line of your email. We look
forward to hearing from you and have an Unregular Day!!!
notices: OK for recruiters to contact this job poster.
attributes:
job title:
                Cashier / Pizza Cook Counter

title: Taiwanese restaurant
label: post
post:
📢 Join Our Restaurant Family – High Pay, Great Opportunities!



🍜 Positions Available: Server / Cashier

✨ No experience needed – full training provided!



We’re looking for people who:



* Love food and enjoy serving others

* Are responsible, friendly, and motivated

* Want to grow together with our team



As a Server / Cashier, your main duties include:



* Greeting customers warmly and providing excellent service throughout their dining experience

* Taking and delivering food and beverage orders accurately and efficiently

* Handling customer payments, operating the cash register, and processing transactions

* Assisting with menu questions, recommendations, and special requests

* Maintaining cleanliness and organization of dining areas, counters, and workstations

* Ensuring food safety and hygiene standards are followed

* Supporting team members during busy hours and working collaboratively

* Addressing customer concerns politely and resolving issues promptly

* Assisting in opening and closing duties as required

* Upholding the restaurant’s values of quality, professionalism, and hospitality



What we offer:

✅ Competitive pay + performance bonuses 💰

✅ Flexible working hours

✅ Career growth & promotion opportunities

✅ Supportive, professional, and friendly work environment



📩 How to Apply:

Please send your resume or a short introduction via text message to the contact number provided.
notices: OK for recruiters to contact this job poster.

title: Pharmacy experience (Spanish AND Chinese) speaking a must
label: post
post:
We are looking for an experience pharmacy helper, who has experience as cashier/technician.



Must have experience in dispensing medications and following pharmacy workflow. Must be able to communicate very well with
patients and attend to their needs. Must be punctual and attentive to details. Any experience with pharmacy is a plus. Looking to
hire asap. Pay will depend upon experience. If reliable and hard working willing to pay more.



We use BestRx system; willing to train



Must know Spanish and Chinese (cantonese or mandarin)



Job type: Full Time



Minimum 40 hours per week
notices: Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

title: CONNECTING HANDYMEN WITH CUSTOMERS - Paid Weekly
location: CONNECTING HANDYMEN WITH CUSTOMERS - Paid Weekly
label: post
post:

Click to apply
[https://handy.com/apply/?iama=handyman&job_posting_id=41565fb1-3e5a-49a2-84da-d7fab7b6e740&lcl_post_time=20251010_194400&utm_campaign=%5B%22NNJ-Handy-Supply-Branded-Handyman-DR%22%5D&utm_content=title-379%3Bimage-449%3Bdesc-379%3Btag-1378&utm_medium=Details&utm_source=craigslist]

Looking for handymen with experience! Angi Services for Pros is a nationwide home services platform that is looking to connect
professional handymen with customers. Angi Services operates in more than 250 cities and has been featured in sites like Forbes,
NYTimes, CNBC, The Economist.


Our app will connect you to customers instantly. Switch it on to see people near you who booked a handyman service. Claim the job
to connect with the customer. Arrive on time. Complete their service call. Get paid!


The details:


- Make money performing light handyman jobs: heavy lifting, furniture assembly, tv mounting, - Complete transparency: see how much
you earn from the customer for each job before you claim it


Who are you?


- Are able to perform a variety of home improvement tasks independently


- Have all your own hand tools and power tools


- 18+ with paid experience in home improvement


Angi Services is not an employer, but simply connects independent service professionals with customers looking for home services.
